short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Picks a movie at random from your Kanopy watchlist.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Overwhelmed by all the movies you have added to your Kanopy watchlist? This extension will randomly choose one of them.

Step 1: Sign in to your Kanopy.com account and navigate to your watchlist page.
Step 2: An icon (crossed arrows) will appear in your Chrome menu bar's extension drop-down. Click it!
Step 3: Watch your randomly-chosen movie.

This extension is unofficial and is not created, endorsed, or supported by Kanopy, Inc.

Icon licensed from https://fontawesome.com/license
